abstract: NHL All-Star Game will be played in three-on-three format, which has been implemented in overtime during regular season and is popular with fans.
lead_paragraph: The rules used in overtime during the regular season are popular with fans, and the league adopted them for its midseason showcase.

headline.main: With Fewer Skaters, N.H.L. Hopes for More All-Star Competitiveness
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Hopes Fewer Skaters Will Mean More Competition in Its All-Star Game

snippet: The rules used in overtime during the regular season are popular with fans, and the league adopted them for its midseason showcase.
